basics.name: Sara Rose
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Cybersecurity and Information Assurance at Western Governors University. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2024.

summary.name: Driven professional with a proficient background in private security, investigation, and hairstyling, transitioning to cybersecurity. Skilled in forensic investigation and technical documentation, adept at conducting comprehensive analyses of compromised systems to identify root causes and assess impacts. Proactively develops incident response plans to uphold stringent security standards. Experienced in managing client expectations, negotiating solutions, and resolving conflicts gained through 15 years in hairstyling. Known for exceptional people-facing soft skills, adept at building rapport and communicating effectively to ensure client satisfaction. Eager to apply evolving skills in digital forensics and incident response to protect individuals, businesses, and assets from cyber threats.

education.certifications: CompTIA A+. Net+, ISC2, Licensed Locksmith, Licensed Private Investigator

work.summary: Award Winning stylist and published artist
highlights: Cultivated a loyal client base through exceptional client relations skills, ensuring high, satisfaction and repeat business. Managed all aspects of the business independently, including scheduling, client appointments, and inventory management, maintaining efficiency and organization.

Created an educational program to help elderly members of the community be warned about the dangers of scams, phishing, and password management. Provide free troubleshooting services for cellphones, Internet/Network, laptop and computer repairs.

volunteer.summary: Restoring native eelgrass meadows providing a crucial food source for the West Indian Manatee.
highlights: Volunteers play a critical role in educating the public about manatee conservation and environmental stewardship. This could involve giving presentations, leading guided tours, or participating in outreach events to raise awareness about manatee biology, conservation challenges, and how individuals can help protect these gentle creatures.

Professional Associations.title: FALI- Florida Association of Licensed Investigators
